Alert Name: bush
Democrats attack Big Oil over $3 gas prices
Hearings planned in the House; Senate Leader Reid wants to cut gas demand, hike economy of cars and trucks.
05/08/07 05:03 PM, EDT
The Senate's top Democrat on Tuesday accused Big Oil of shutting down refineries temporarily to raise gasoline prices and rake in "obscene profits."
FULL STORY
